manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Crisscross X-Shape Base The Hammock Chair Stands are sturdy & durable .Safe, stableof the hammock stands , and secure Crisscross X-shape of the hanging hammock chair stand base saves space and provides balance. Stainless Ground Pin When using outdoors, using the ground nails can also reduce the shaking of the stand and create a more stable platform. Super thick support Customer safety is our biggest concern. The diameter of the support pipe is 48mm, solid and safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Bought the FDW Hammock Chair Stands Hanging Hammock Stand as a gift. It was one of the highest rated and tallest stands I could find. This is a very sturdy stand, has some weight to it. Like the holes in the base of the legs if you wanted to add stakes to secure it to the ground. I was able to assemble this myself in about 25 minutes. Instructions are a bit rough but just looking at the picture and the parts gave me some direction. When a swing was attached, there was no sense or feeling like it was going to tip. I would recommend this and I'm glad I choose wisely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble & sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I bought the hammock chair at the fair and needed a stand for it. This arrived in 2 days and took about 15 minutes to assemble. Love it. Exactly what we wanted. Will be buying pads / slider to put under legs so it doesn’t rip the carpet. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really thought for the price, these would be a thin metal type of chair...boy was I wrong! These are amazing and VERY sturdy! Glad I took the chance on them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Dimensions are just right for small space. The bottom legs are a little bit wonky when swing is rocked. I tightened all the screws but it is still wonky. I tried using the swing and it doesn’t topple so it’s fine as long as I don’t swing in long angles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Perfect stand for my chair! It’s super sturdy and very heavy so it’s not going anywhere. If you had it on land you could stake it into the dirt for extra security but not needed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does not take up much space. It’s easy to move or swing around in the hammock swing we bought to go on it. The base doesn’t stick out far or create a trip hazard, but it is sturdy and secure. This design allows you to easily move and get a clear view 360•

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, works well.
reviews.reviewText: The only thing that I did not like was the flimsy washers that came with the thing..Everything else is good. It is easy to assemble. There is not any kind of adjustment and it does not swivel.You may or may not need extra spring/carabiner and it does depend on the length of the chair you have. Keep in mind that the fabric of the chair will eventually stretch with use and you butt may become too close to the bottom connection (you don't want to hit that). For my chair, an extra knot at the top hanging rope solved the problem (at least for now).The longer section of the base is forward and please, no swinging on this thing -this warning is on the instructions too ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. It is SUPER heavy! Not to be taken in/out of the house. I got the swing up and almost needed a step stool to get in it...not sure I like it.
I love sitting in my hammock chair in my bedroom to read a book. A bit of indoor summer enjoyment. Very sturdy frame and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: IT DOESN'T COME WITH THE SEAT!!!
reviews.reviewText: Advertises it coming with a seat. There is no way I paid almost $200 for a stand without a seat! I have looked and there are chairs and seats being sold together for just as much as I paid for just the STAND!!!!!!!! I feel like I was scammed and it should have been clearly stated that it did not come with the seat! If it had said that I would not have purchased this!!!
